name: CODE DEADLIGHT
description:
It’s the year 2029, and the big multinational multinational conglomerate Corp Corp has just introduced a new line of killer robots to be used in Water Wars everywhere... Unfortunately, you don't care about any of that as you are a husk of machine trying to survive the gauntlet of test being thrown at you.

Features:

  • Full Controller Support allowing for mid-game switching
  • Persistent High score but no leaderboard sadly...
  • 35 different Upgrade Cards to improve your chance of survival... maybe?
  • 7 different side-arms to try out and break the game with...
  • 6 Different Enemies to destroy you and be angry at!

Controls:

  • Left Stick/WASD/Arrow Keys: Standard Movement
  • Mouse/Right Stick: Aim
  • Left Click/Right Trigger: Shoot (PEW PEW)
  • Tab/Select: Open the Upgrade Menu
  • Esc/Start: Pause Menu
  • Right Click/Left Trigger: Use Sidearm

You can review the controls in the setting page.
